venue.name: Zesiger Sports & Fitness Center at MIT

item.description:
Now in it's 10th year, Multisport World Boston returns to MIT for a day designed to feed your passion for triathlon with information packed seminars, training clinics, classroom style workshops, competitive events, activities for the kids, a HUGE vendor expo and much, much more.

Admission to the seminars and vendor expo is FREE and registration is now open. Click here to register and you'll be eligible to win the Grand Prize Giveaway, a CompuTrainer Pro (a $1,500 value!) which offers you the ultimate in indoor bike training. Registration also makes you eligible to win other great prizes, snag a swag bag, receive exclusive discounts on clinics and workshops offered throughout the day at Multisport World Boston.

Clinics: 8AM-4PM

Seminars: 9AM-4PM

Expo: 10AM-4:30PM


For more information go to: www.multisportworld.com/Boston.htm

To register for free go here.
item.name: Multisport World Conference and Expo 2012
